articles.content: The Poco X4 Pro 5G comes with a triple camera setup at the back. The rear camera system comprises a 64MP main sensor with f/1.79 aperture, 8MP ultra-wide-angle lens with f/2.2 aperture and 2MP macro … [+1122 chars]
